about_the_game:
Barako and his crew are a group of benevolent pirates who fight fist to fist against a variety of enemies, going on adventures and giving their treasure to the poor. But one day, they find a 10 year old boy hidden among their latest plunder...

Are you ready to go on a high seas adventure? Join Barako and his crew as they fight against rival pirate crews, monsters, hunt for buried treasure and sail the seas in an exciting pirate themed adventure!


Features:

Passive skill system
Each crew member has their own set of unique skills which only they can use outside of combat. For example, Barako can lift heavy objects, Vincenzo can jump a long distance and play musical instruments, Cedric can heal NPCs and can detect useable herbs, just to name a few! Just choose which character you want to use by placing them at the head of the party!

Combat isn't just mashing attack!
The player is encouraged to use a variety of skills due to cooldowns and each attack having unique properties and status effects attached to them!

Tools aplenty!
Dig for buried treasure with a shovel, bust open locked doors with a crowbar, light dungeons and set fires with a lantern, and fish for aquatic life with a fishing rod. Items won't be automatically used either, you have to use your brain and use them manually!

Trauma Points
Also features the trauma point system. The more TP a character accumulates by getting hit, the more damage they will take. Can only make TP go down by resting at an inn or at certain save points.

Gameplay Trailer Credits
Battle Music - Let's Go Do Pirate Stuff (Instrumental) by Voltz Supreme
Victory Music - Monkey Island Band (Looping) by Eric Matyas

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains sexual references, drug use, coarse language and mild violence.
